blue.name: Blue Dungeon
blue.description: Hidden within a Fortress; hidden within a prison. Hycenea's chains stay bound.

pink.name: Pink Dungeon
pink.description: Seasons bend and twist rapidly here. Deep in this dungeon lies a dark secret, do you dare seek it out?

white.name: White Dungeon
white.description: Before you lies the ancient sacrificial temple to a lost god...

yellow.name: Yellow Dungeon
yellow.description: The seasons rage before you, a curse on the Sons of the Forest. Can you overcome them?

purple.name: Purple Dungeon
purple.description: Below the mythical island of Corsair's Claw, the legendary pirate Varcosa awaits you.

zenith.name: The Celestial Zenith
zenith.description: You find yourself for the first time within a Wool. A world awaits - as does a mission from Uriddan himself.

depths.name: Darkest Depths
depths.description: Far, far below the waves lies a disturbance, a tear into our world. What possibly could have caused this?

brown.name: Brown Dungeon
brown.description: Mechanical clanking and buzzing noises spew forth from the ground. What lies deep below Pelias' folly?

magenta.name: Magenta Dungeon
magenta.description: From the depths, you can feel a sickness pouring. What lies below?

gray.name: Gray Dungeon
gray.description: What would force a kingdom to lock off their capital? Al Malakut awaits its rediscovery.

indigo.name: Indigo Dungeon
indigo.description: The very sky has inverted, leaving nothing but space below your feet. Phyrrys lies above, waiting for you in the darkness.

orange.name: Orange Dungeon
orange.description: You discovered a lost outpost of the Tlaxans, hiding more than just loot...

cyan.name: Cyan Dungeon
cyan.description: Deep below the ground lies an abandoned mineshaft, stained with secrets long forgotten. For what is a greater folly of man than the sin of greed?

lime.name: Lime Dungeon
lime.description: Before you stands an empire lost to time, independent of Ishnir and Chillwind. What secrets from the distant past lie within?

r1bonus.name: The Black Willows
r1bonus.description: A lost grove stretches before you, filled with riches.

light_gray.name: Light Gray Dungeon
light_gray.description: Hidden within a citadel; hidden within a mirror. Alutana's palace stands strong.

skt.name: Silver Knight's Tomb
skt.description: Before you stands a gate, leading deep into the surviving ruins of Isharist. The Teal Spirit waits within...

fred.name: City of Shifting Waters
fred.description: Deep below Steelmeld, sealed away by its unknown former inhabitants, lies secrets long since forgotten.

light_blue.name: Light Blue Dungeon
light_blue.description: There must be secrets hiding within this ancient place.

labs.name: Alchemy Labs Dungeon
labs.description: Ahead lies the Alchemy Labs, bandits, and their cache of explosives.

forum.name: The Fallen Forum
forum.description: Having passed through the time itself in the ruins of the Congress, the Fallen Forum awaits.

hexfall.name: Hexfall
hexfall.description: The time has come to face the head of the witches, the dryad Hycenea, who wishes to claim the Blue Wool from you. Do you have it within you to hold her back from her love?

teal.name: Echoes of Oblivion
teal.description: Having passed through the Sacrarium of Aeons, a strange place lost to time now sits before you.
